ban.too-high: It seems that this member is too high for me to ban him. :thinking:
ban.list-error: Oops, it looks like there are too many users to display :confused:
ban.list-title-0: List of banned members of the server "{}"
ban.list-title-1: List of 45 banned members of the server "{}"
ban.list-title-2: List of 60 banned members of the server "{}"
ban.no-bans: No member seems to be banned from here
ban.user-not-banned: This person is not part of the banned members list :upside_down:

en.ban-dm: You have just been banned from the server %{guild} :confused:
en.cant-find-user: Oops, no way to find the user **%{user}**
en.cant-pin: Oops, I don't have permission to pin messages

clear.too-few: I can't delete so few messages
clear.not-found: Hmm... impossible to delete these messages. Discord tells me they don't exist :thinking:

destop.no-guild: This message does not belong to this server
destop.too-old: I can't delete messages older than %{days} days!

emoji.cant-emoji: Oops, I'm missing the permission `Manage emojis` :confused:
emoji.emoji-valid: The emoji %{name} has been modified to allow only the roles %{roles}
emoji.wrong-guild: Oops, it seems this emoji doesn't belong to this server :thinking:

en.error: Oops, an unknown error occurred. Try again later or contact support

kick.too-high: It seems that this member is too high for me to kick him out :thinking:

en.kick-chat: Member M{user} (%{userid}) has been kicked from this server
en.kick-dm: You have just been kicked from the server %{guild} :confused:
en.missing-manage-nick: Oops, I'm missing the "Manage nicknames" permission!
en.missing-user-perms: Oops, you're missing permissions (either manage roles, manage server or manage messages)

mute.cant-mute: Oops, it seems that I don't have enough permissions for that.... Please give me permission `Manage roles` before continuing.
mute.mute-config-err: Impossible to do that. Please check my permissions on the server and try again.

mute-config-success.zero: The role has been successfully created and configured!
mute-config-success.other: The role has been successfully created and configured! (%{count} channels could not be configured, due to lack of permissions)

mute-config-success2.zero: The role has been successfully configured!
mute-config-success2.other: The role has been successfully configured! (%{count} channels could not be configured, due to lack of permissions)

mute.mute-high: Oops, it seems that the `muted` role is too high for me to give it... Please fix this problem by placing my role higher than the `muted` role.
mute.list-title-0: List of muted members of the server "%{guild}"
mute.list-title-1: List of 45 muted members of the server "%{guild}"
mute.list-title-2: List of 60 muted members of the server "%{guild}"
mute.role-created:
Successfully created `muted` role!
You can use the `%{p}mute-config` command for automatic configuration in your server.
mute.no-mute: Oops, it seems that the role `muted` does not exist :confused: Please create it and assign permissions manually.
mute.no-mutes: No member seems to be banned from here
mute.staff-mute: You can't prevent another staff member from speaking

en.mute-dm: You have been muted in the server %{guild}
en.need-read-history: Oops, I'm missing the permission to "Read Message History" :confused:

pin.error-notfound: Oops, I can't find that message (Error : `%{err}`)
pin.error-toomuch: Oops, impossible to pin this message (do you have more than 50 pinned messages?). Error : `%{err}`

en.raid-banned: You have been automatically banned from the %{guild} server by the antiraid system.
en.raid-kicked: You have been automatically kicked out of the %{guild} server by the anti-raid system. Try again in a few days.
en.react-clear: I'm unable to find this message :confused:

give-success.zero: -> No role could be assigned out of %{m}

role.give-too-high: Oops, it seems that this role is too high for me to give or remove to anyone. Please place my role above the `%{r}` role
role.give-roles-higher: You can't give or remove roles higher than yours!
role.too-high: Oops, this role is too high for me to change. Please move my role above the role `%{r}` before trying again :confused:

slowmode.disabled: The slowmode is now disabled in this channel.
slowmode.too-long: Impossible to set a frequency higher than six hours
slowmode.enabled: The %{channel} channel is now in slowmode. Wait %{s} seconds before sending a message.
slowmode.info: The slowmode of this channel is currently at {} seconds
slowmode.cant-slowmode: Oops, I don't have permission to `Manage this channel` :confused:

en.unban-chat: The member %{user} (%{userid}) is no longer banned from this server
en.verify-role-high: Oops, it seems that the role %{r} is too high for me to give it. Please place this role lower than mine, or place my role above it.
verify_questions: What is 2+7?
What does the product of 2 by 3 give?
Which of these words begins with D? `bathtub`, `crow`, `galion` or `drawing`
drawing
How many sides does a triangle have?
What is the result of 10 minus 5?
What is the first letter of `Zbot`?
z
What is the name of this server?
_special_servername
What is the name of the French bread known all over the world? (one word)
baguette
What is the opposite color to black?
white
What is the fourth cardinal point? North, south, east, ...
west
What does the emoji :pig: represent? A `fish`, `plant` or `pig`?
pig
What geometric shape has 3 sides?
triangle
How many seconds are there in a minute?

warn.cant-staff: You can't warn another staff member!
warn.warn-but-db: Our database being offline, the warning could not be saved. Nevertheless, the member did receive their warning in DM

en.warn-dm: You have received a warning from the %{guild} server
